item.description:
Meet other members of the Digital Arts group from 7:30 to 9:00 pm, for networking, food and drink, and an informal discussion about the arts. Learn about our goals and objectives and share your ideas for future meetup events.

Please submit payment through Paypal when you sign up. To reduce no-shows, the $5 fee will not be refunded unless not enough members sign up for the event and I have to cancel. Please be sure you can attend before you sign up. The entire $5 will go toward the meetup administration fee I paid to organize the group.

RSVPs will be closed on October 9th.

All members are welcome, new and old. I look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the digital arts group / I'll bring a sign for the table

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Networking Dinner @ the Trident
